function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Uncertainty around data usage in the context of public private partnerships ppp for smart and safe city implementation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vector control tools implemented for malaria","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai in healthcare chatbots","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental and physical health issues due to poor living conditions and lack of physical distancing within shared dwellings.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban heat islands uhis","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient effectiveness of quarantine measures due to population density and distribution","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High negative ion concentration in the ionizer enclosure","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate city infrastructure and design for disease management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and indoor air quality iaq","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear universal applicability of results due to study settings favoring the united states","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resilience of bike-sharing network compared to subway system during covid-19.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Role of national population characteristics in covid-19 diffusion","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreaction and exaggeration of the seriousness of covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Linear relationship between contact rates and visitor density","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation increases the risk of transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor removal of sars-cov-2 in conventional wwtp","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in viral load estimates in sewage and stool","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in control measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of elderly population due to digital divide","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection likelihood exceeding 1% with exposure time exceeding 2 hours","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous network protocols and smart applications in remote consultation could lead to privacy and security vulnerabilities.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupant exposure in confined spaces based on social distance radius","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Protection by ventilation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of synergy between top-down and bottom-up approaches","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of resort operations leading to under-occupancy and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of decreased ridership on public transit due to fear of contagion","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Users might not have the time or inclination to continually provide updated information from wearables and self-reported symptoms.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bot armies to manipulate platform algorithms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disconnected street networks can limit access to healthcare facilities and increase reliance on vehicles for travel","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and analysis of publicly available twitter feeds may contain personal or sensitive information related to loneliness and covid-19.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Raw sewage samples collected from multiple wwtps in densely populated areas.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unnecessary energy usage","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Civil-liberty concerns due to increased surveillance and personal data collection.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex wastewater matrix as a challenge for biosensor detection","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting public health requirements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient air filtration technology contributing to indoor air pollution.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for computational efficiency in design methodology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with government guidelines","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of new variants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns among building occupants due to the continuous collection of personal physiological and psychometric data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trend of increasing urban population and shift towards apartment living with less outdoor space.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Habitat encroachment and fragmentation leading to increased wildlife-urban interfaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased privacy and safety concerns in telemedicine","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow variability in the building may result in stagnant air and concentration of pollutants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anonymized mobility data may compromise individual privacy and data security.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the estimation of the effective reproductive ratio r_eff due to complex model dynamics and parameters","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protective equipment and cleaning tools for janitors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fewer office workers in the data sharing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"}]}
